bug.author: calvinjia
bug.summary: Slashes get converted to underscores in the metrics UI page
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0.0-SNAPSHOT Describe the bug The web UI escapes slashes / as underscores _. This is particularly bad in the metrics UI where Alluxio displays the under filesystem metrics. To Reproduce Deploy Alluxio with an under filesystem which has a /. Open the metrics tab and look at the under filesystem metrics. Expected behavior The under filesystem metrics are titled appropriately with /. Urgency Bad cosmetic bug, should be addressed before next release.

comments.comment:
Please correct me if I'm wrong, I think this is cause by alluxio/core/common/src/main/java/alluxio/metrics/MetricsSystem.java /** * Escapes a URI, replacing "/" and "." with "_" so that when the URI is used in a metric name, * the "/" and "." won't be interpreted as path separators. * * @param uri the URI to escape * @return the string representing the escaped URI */ public static String escape(AlluxioURI uri) { return uri.toString().replace("/", "_").replace(".", "_"); } Dating back to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/commit/a34aaeeb832b82aeb3747b27e342044291287fe1#diff-2430397f25c728733f428f222dbbde2a>a34aaee#diff-2430397f25c728733f428f222dbbde2a</denchmark-link>
Since this method is used in quite a few places I think this method should be kept as-is. And add another un-escape before returning the metrics back to React UI or handle this in React. What do you think? <denchmark-link:https://github.com/bf8086>@bf8086</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/calvinjia>@calvinjia</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/calvinjia>@calvinjia</denchmark-link> do you know why we need to escape ? It seems the metrics library only use as a separator.
